fish.name: Pufferfish
fish.description: Inflates when threatened.

fish.name: Anchovy
fish.description: A small silver fish found in the ocean.

fish.name: Tuna
fish.description: A large fish that lives in the ocean.

fish.name: Sardine
fish.description: A common ocean fish.

fish.name: Bream
fish.description: A fairly common river fish that becomes active at night.

fish.name: Largemouth Bass
fish.description: A popular fish that lives in lakes.

fish.name: Smallmouth Bass
fish.description: A freshwater fish that is very sensitive to pollution.

fish.name: Rainbow Trout
fish.description: A freshwater trout with colorful markings.

fish.name: Salmon
fish.description: Swims upstream to lay its eggs.

fish.name: Walleye
fish.description: A freshwater fish caught at night.
fish.location: River • Mountain Lake • Forest Pond • Forest Farm Pond

fish.name: Perch
fish.description: A freshwater fish of the winter.

fish.name: Carp
fish.description: A common pond fish.
fish.location: Mountain Lake • Secret Woods • The Sewers • Mutant Bug Lair

fish.name: Catfish
fish.description: An uncommon fish found in streams.

fish.name: Pike
fish.description: A freshwater fish that's difficult to catch.

fish.name: Sunfish
fish.description: A common river fish.

fish.name: Red Mullet
fish.description: Long ago these were kept as pets.

fish.name: Herring
fish.description: A common ocean fish.

fish.name: Eel
fish.description: A long, slippery little fish.

fish.name: Octopus
fish.description: A mysterious and intelligent creature.
fish.location: The Beach • Ginger Island • Submarine at Night Market

fish.name: Red Snapper
fish.description: A popular fish with a nice red color.

fish.name: Squid
fish.description: A deep sea creature that can grow to enormous size.

fish.name: Sea Cucumber
fish.description: A slippery, slimy creature found on the ocean floor.

fish.name: Super Cucumber
fish.description: A rare, purple variety of sea cucumber.
fish.location: Ocean • Ginger Island • Submarine at Night Market

fish.name: Ghostfish
fish.description: A pale, blind fish found in underground lakes.

fish.name: Stonefish
fish.description: A bizarre fish that's shaped like a brick.

fish.name: Crimsonfish
fish.description: Lives deep in the ocean but likes to lay its eggs in the warm summer water.

fish.name: Angler
fish.description: Uses a bioluminescent dangler to attract prey.

fish.name: Ice Pip
fish.description: A rare fish that thrives in extremely cold conditions.

fish.name: Lava Eel
fish.description: It can somehow survive in pools of red-hot lava.
fish.location: Floor 100 of The Mines • Volcano Caldera

fish.name: Legend
fish.description: The king of all fish! They said he'd never be caught.

fish.name: Sandfish
fish.description: It tries to hide using camouflage.

fish.name: Scorpion Carp
fish.description: It's like a regular carp but with a sharp stinger.

fish.name: Flounder
fish.description: It lives on the bottom, so both eyes are on top of its head.

fish.name: Midnight Carp
fish.description: This shy fish only feels comfortable at night.
fish.location: Mountain Lake • Forest Pond • Ginger Island North & West

fish.name: Mutant Carp
fish.description: The strange waters of the sewer turned this carp into a monstrosity.

fish.name: Sturgeon
fish.description: An ancient bottom-feeder with a dwindling population. Females can live up to 150 years.

fish.name: Tiger Trout
fish.description: A rare hybrid trout that cannot bear offspring of its own.

fish.name: Bullhead
fish.description: A relative of the catfish that eats a variety of foods off the lake bottom.

fish.name: Tilapia
fish.description: A primarily vegetarian fish that prefers warm water.

fish.name: Chub
fish.description: A common freshwater fish known for its voracious appetite.

fish.name: Dorado
fish.description: A fierce carnivore with brilliant orange scales.

fish.name: Albacore
fish.description: Prefers temperature "edges" where cool and warm water meet.

fish.name: Shad
fish.description: Lives in a school at sea, but returns to the rivers to spawn.

fish.name: Lingcod
fish.description: A fearsome predator that will eat almost anything it can cram into its mouth.

fish.name: Halibut
fish.description: A flat fish that lives on the ocean floor.

fish.name: Woodskip
fish.description: A very sensitive fish that can only live in pools deep in the forest.

fish.name: Glacierfish
fish.description: Builds a nest on the underside of glaciers.

fish.name: Void Salmon
fish.description: A salmon, twisted by void energy. The fresh meat is jet black, but rapidly turns pink when exposed to air.

fish.name: Slimejack
fish.description: He's coated in a very thick layer of slime. He keeps slipping out of your hands!

fish.name: Midnight Squid
fish.description: A strange and mysterious denizen of the ocean's twilight depths.

fish.name: Spook Fish
fish.description: The huge eyes can detect the faint silhouettes of prey.

fish.name: Blobfish
fish.description: This odd creature floats above the ocean floor, consuming any edible material in its path.

fish.name: Stingray
fish.description: Despite having a toxic stinger, these fish are shy and prefer to avoid humans.

fish.name: Lionfish
fish.description: An aggressive, predatory fish with venomous spines.

fish.name: Blue Discus
fish.description: A brightly colored tropical fish that is popular in aquariums.

fish.name: Goby
fish.description: Some types of Gobies can climb up waterfalls.

foodstuffs.name: Seaweed
foodstuffs.description: It can be used in cooking.

crabpots.description: A scavenger that feeds off the ocean floor. Widely prized for its meat.

crabpots.name: Snail
crabpots.description: A wide-ranging mollusc that lives in a spiral shell.

crabpots.name: Periwinkle
crabpots.description: A tiny freshwater snail that lives in a blue shell.

crabpots.name: Oyster
crabpots.description: Constantly filters water to find food. In the process, it removes dangerous toxins from the environment.
